content.query:
-- cleanse query for Post secondary file
-- * case statement needs to be updated each time there is a new data ingestion. 

/*
IF EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM sys.tables
    WHERE name = 'PostSecondary' AND schema_id = SCHEMA_ID('cleanse')
)
BEGIN
    EXEC('DROP TABLE cleanse.PostSecondary')
END
*/

 
 SELECT *
	  ,CASE 
            WHEN DistrictTTL LIKE 'Tacoma%' and [SchoolTTL] like 'District Wide' THEN 'Tacoma School District' 
			WHEN DistrictTTL LIKE 'Seattle%' and [SchoolTTL] like 'District Wide' THEN 'Seattle Public Schools' 
			Else null
			End as DistrictName
	  ,Case
            WHEN SchoolTTL LIKE '%Atlas%' THEN 'Summit Atlas' 
            WHEN SchoolTTL LIKE '%Sierra%' THEN 'Summit Sierra'
            WHEN SchoolTTL LIKE '%Summit Public School: Ol%' THEN 'Summit Olympus'
            ELSE NULL
       END AS SchoolName
--Into [cleanse].[PostSecondary]
FROM [staging].[PostSecondary]

select *
from [cleanse].[PostSecondary]
